item.title: My Linux Beginnings
item.description: Preface Link to heading I’ve always been a big Linux guy. I started running Linux back while I was studying for my bachelors. Since I had no clue which distro was good or bad, I had to go with the most meme-worthy one. I started out with Arch Linux because I saw a meme that went like: “I run Arch btw” on reddit. I didn’t quite get what the hype was all about initially, had I known the pain and suffering that I will have to go through just to get the system to boot, I would thought twice before taking the jump.
